snippet.title: Flagman Game A Gameplay - Nintendo Game & Watch
snippet.description:
The object is to repeat the pattern of numbers on the flags held up by the on-screen character Mr. Game & Watch. A life is lost each time the player pushes the wrong button or hits the correct number too late. The game ends when three lives are lost. 

If you need a stand to display your game, take a look of the stands I use http://www.addingoil.com/store
